data.title: MAIDSTONE. A MYSTERY. Signed by Mailer, Norman: Soft cover 1st Edition., Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition. - Soft cover - New York: Signet, (1971) - 1st Edition. Soft cover. Signed by Author(s). First Edition, first printing of this paperback original Signed by Norman Mailer on the half-title. Publisher's pictorial stiff card wrappers with the slightest of use at the extremities. A screenplay, adapted into film by Mailer, based on The Armies of the Night, winner of the Pulitzer Prize and National Book Award. With details of the filming, colour stills and an essay on filmmaking. 12mo. 191 pp. - MAIDSTONE. A MYSTERY. Signed

Shipping Terms:

Shipping From Montreal, Canada & New York, 12914. Orders ship within 3-4 business

days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book

order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is
